To run survival evaluation, you need provide a *csv* formatted table, with at least two columns:

| Sample ID | Days to last known alive | Vital status | Other fields |
|-----------|--------------------------|--------------|--------------|
| XXXXXX    | 784                      | Dead         | ...          |
| XXXXXX    | 475                      | Alive        | ...          |
| XXXXXX    | 1331                     | Alive        | ...          |
| ...       | ...                      | ...          | ...          |
